scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:postcss
scripts.backstop:clean: find tests/backstop_data/bitmaps_test -mindepth 1 -delete || true && find tests/backstop_data/bitmaps_reference -mindepth 1 -delete || true
scripts.reference-tests: npm run backstop:clean && npm run backstop:ref && npm run backstop:test
scripts.playwright-test: npx playwright install && cd tests && npx playwright test
scripts.test: npm run reference-tests && npm run playwright-test

scriptsDescription.build: Build complete CSS from SCSS and apply PostCSS
scriptsDescription.reference-tests: Run BackstopJS visual regression tests (reference and test)
